pr_title: set all cache connector to https and code refactoring

timeline.message:
set all cache connector to https and code refactoring

All cache connectors use now https addresses.
This needs to reflect in our code base.

Additionally, I did some refactoring to have all connectors in own package dirs with a package-info.

timeline.bodyText: As part of general cleanup and since you touched this code anyway - shouldn't this method be renamed from getHttps to isHttps? Since it's returning trivial boolean value and that's the common convention to use is... for bool methods...
timeline.author: okainov

timeline.bodyText: For gc.su connector in similar place I was using connector.getHttps() which IMO more transparent than bare true value and also it's better for maintainability as you won't need to update in everywhere if something changes..
timeline.author: okainov

replies.bodyText:
The https parameter from the OAuthParameters data structure is now unused.
This will not covered in this PR.
replies.author: bekuno

timeline.bodyText: a bit of off-topic, but www is also obsolete now and can be removed :)
timeline.author: okainov

timeline.message:
- change to https on tests for geocaching.su
- remove www on geocaching.su
- rename getHttps to isHttps because of its boolean return
- set cache url depending of https state for geopeidus
